statements: SELECT * FROM event_vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email_address FROM event_vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM event_vendors WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT vendor_name, services_offered FROM event_vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_number FROM event_vendors WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM event_vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_number, services_offered FROM event_vendors WHERE vendor_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT vendor_name, email_address FROM event_vendors WHERE services_offered LIKE '%decor%' ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_number, email_address FROM event_vendors WHERE past_client_reviews IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM event_vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE '%Catering%' AND contact_number LIKE '+1%' ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT client_name, rating, comments FROM reviews WHERE vendor_id = 3 AND rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendors ORDER BY contact_person DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM reviews GROUP BY vendor_id;
SELECT client_name, comments FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number, (SELECT AVG(rating) FROM reviews WHERE reviews.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id) AS avg_rating FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email_address FROM vendors;
SELECT review_rating, review_comment FROM reviews ORDER BY review_rating DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT service_category, service_description FROM services WHERE vendor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT client_name, review_rating, review_comment FROM reviews WHERE vendor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY review_rating DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT service_category, service_description FROM services ORDER BY service_category DESC;
SELECT client_name, review_rating, review_comment FROM reviews WHERE review_rating > 4.0 ORDER BY review_rating DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, email_address FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%' AND contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT vendor_name, service_category FROM vendors JOIN services ON vendors.vendor_id = services.vendor_id WHERE service_category = 'Wedding Services';
SELECT * FROM event_vendors;
SELECT name, contact_number, email FROM event_vendors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT client_name, rating, review_text FROM client_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, service_name, price FROM services_offered WHERE price < 100;
SELECT vendor_id, category_name FROM vendor_categories ORDER BY vendor_id ASC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM event_vendors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT service_name, price, description FROM services_offered WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT client_name, rating, review_text FROM client_reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT vendor_id, category_name FROM vendor_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM event_vendors WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendors WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM services WHERE service_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM clients WHERE client_phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM services WHERE service_name = 'Web Development' AND vendor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors JOIN reviews ON vendors.vendor_id = reviews.vendor_id WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM clients WHERE client_phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, service_name, rating FROM vendors JOIN vendor_services ON vendors.vendor_id = vendor_services.vendor_id JOIN reviews ON reviews.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id ORDER BY rating DESC;
